synthesis_conditions.label: general_description
synthesis_conditions.details: Demonstration of reversible magnetic phase switching between disordered and ordered states in a D/A-MOF used as the cathode material of an LIB through discharge/charge cycles.

synthesis_conditions.label: chemicals_used
synthesis_conditions.details: Combination of [Ru2II,II(CF3CO2)4(THF)2] with EHOMO(D) = –5.6183 eV and BTDA-TCNQ with ELUMO(A) = –4.7353 eV.

synthesis_conditions.label: method
synthesis_conditions.details: Synthesized using a slow diffusion reaction technique.

synthesis_conditions.label: solvents
synthesis_conditions.details: Solution of BTDA-TCNQ in CH2Cl2 (50 mL) and a solution of [Ru2II,II(CF3CO2)4(THF)2] in p-xylene (50 mL).

synthesis_conditions.label: time
synthesis_conditions.details: Left undisturbed for one week or more.

synthesis_conditions.label: method
synthesis_conditions.details: Prepared by evacuating a sample of compound 1 for about 12 h at room temperature.

synthesis_conditions.label: method
synthesis_conditions.details: Electron-doping of 1' was carried out through Li+-ion insertion using an LIB system.

synthesis_conditions.label: equipment
synthesis_conditions.details: Coin-type cell was assembled with an ionic liquid as the electrolyte medium.

synthesis_conditions.label: chemicals_used
synthesis_conditions.details: Li metal used as the anode.
